jobActions.name: Keen Edge
jobActions.effect: Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.

jobActions.name: No Mercy
jobActions.effect:
Increases damage dealt by 20%.
Duration: 20s

jobActions.name: Brutal Shell
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 160.
Combo Action: Keen Edge
Combo Potency: 300
Combo Bonus: Restores own HP
Cure Potency: 200
Combo Bonus: Creates a barrier which nullifies damage equaling HP restored
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Camouflage
jobActions.effect:
Increases parry rate by 50% while reducing damage taken by 10%.
Duration: 20s

jobActions.name: Demon Slice
jobActions.effect: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.

jobActions.name: Royal Guard
jobActions.effect:
Significantly increases enmity generation.
Effect ends upon reuse.

jobActions.name: Release Royal Guard
jobActions.effect: Cancels the effect of Royal Guard.

jobActions.name: Lightning Shot
jobActions.effect:
Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 150.
Additional Effect: Increased enmity

jobActions.name: Danger Zone
jobActions.effect: Delivers an attack with a potency of 250.

jobActions.name: Solid Barrel
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 140.
Combo Action: Brutal Shell
Combo Potency: 360
Combo Bonus: Adds a Cartridge to your Powder Gauge

jobActions.name: Burst Strike
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 380.
Additional Effect: Grants Ready to Blast
Duration: 10s
Effect of Ready to Blast ends upon execution of any weaponskill.
Cartridge Cost: 1

jobActions.name: Nebula
jobActions.effect:
Reduces damage taken by 30%.
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Demon Slaughter
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.
Combo Action: Demon Slice
Combo Potency: 160
Combo Bonus: Adds a Cartridge to your Powder Gauge

jobActions.name: Aurora
jobActions.effect:
Grants Regen to target.
Cure Potency: 200
Duration: 18s
Maximum Charges: 2

jobActions.name: Superbolide
jobActions.effect:
Reduces HP to 1 and renders you impervious to most attacks.
Duration: 10s

jobActions.name: Sonic Break
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 300.
Additional Effect: Damage over time
Potency: 60
Duration: 30s
This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

jobActions.name: Rough Divide
jobActions.effect:
Delivers a jumping attack with a potency of 150.
Maximum Charges: 2
Cannot be executed while bound.

jobActions.name: Gnashing Fang
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 380.
Additional Effect: Grants Ready to Rip
Duration: 10s
Effect of Ready to Rip ends upon execution of any weaponskill.
Cartridge Cost: 1
This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

jobActions.name: Savage Claw
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 460.
Combo Action: Gnashing Fang
Combo Bonus: Grants Ready to Tear
Duration: 10s
Effect of Ready to Tear ends upon execution of any weaponskill.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Wicked Talon
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 540.
Combo Action: Savage Claw
Combo Bonus: Grants Ready to Gouge
Duration: 10s
Effect of Ready to Gouge ends upon execution of any weaponskill.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Bow Shock
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Damage over time
Potency: 60
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Heart of Light
jobActions.effect:
Reduces magic damage taken by self and nearby party members by 10%.
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Heart of Stone
jobActions.effect:
Reduces damage taken by a party member or self by 15%.
Duration: 7s
Additional Effect: When targeting a party member while under the effect of Brutal Shell, that effect is also granted to the target
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Continuation
jobActions.effect:
Allows the firing of successive rounds with your gunblade.
Gnashing Fang may be followed by Jugular Rip.
Savage Claw may be followed by Abdomen Tear.
Wicked Talon may be followed by Eye Gouge.
Burst Strike may be followed by Hypervelocity.

jobActions.name: Jugular Rip
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.
Can only be executed when Ready to Rip.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Abdomen Tear
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 240.
Can only be executed when Ready to Tear.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Eye Gouge
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 280.
Can only be executed when Ready to Gouge.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Fated Circle
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 300 to all nearby enemies.
Cartridge Cost: 1

jobActions.name: Bloodfest
jobActions.effect: Draws aetheric energy from target, adding 3 Cartridges to your Powder Gauge.

jobActions.name: Blasting Zone
jobActions.effect: Delivers an attack with a potency of 720.

jobActions.name: Heart of Corundum
jobActions.effect:
Reduces damage taken by target party member or self by 15%.
Duration: 8s
Additional Effect: When targeting a party member while under the effect of Brutal Shell, that effect is also granted to the target
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: Grants Clarity of Corundum to target
Clarity of Corundum Effect: Reduces damage taken by 15%
Duration: 4s
Additional Effect: Grants Catharsis of Corundum to target
Catharsis of Corundum Effect: Restores HP when HP falls below 50% or upon effect duration expiration
Cure Potency: 900
Duration: 20s

jobActions.name: Hypervelocity
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 180.
Can only be executed when Ready to Blast.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Double Down
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack to all nearby enemies with a potency of 1,200 for the first enemy, and 15% less for all remaining enemies.
Cartridge Cost: 2
This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

roleActions.name: Provoke
roleActions.effect: Gesture threateningly, placing yourself at the top of a target's enmity list while gaining additional enmity.

roleActions.name: Interject
roleActions.effect: Interrupts the use of a target's action.

roleActions.name: Reprisal
roleActions.effect:
Reduces damage dealt by nearby enemies by 10%.
Duration: 10s

roleActions.name: Arm's Length
roleActions.effect:
Creates a barrier nullifying most knockback and draw-in effects.
Duration: 6s
Additional Effect: Slow +20% when barrier is struck
Duration: 15s

roleActions.name: Shirk
roleActions.effect: Diverts 25% of enmity to target party member.

traits.name: Tank Mastery
traits.effect: Reduces damage taken by 20%. Furthermore, grants a bonus to maximum HP based on your vitality attribute, and a bonus to damage dealt based on your strength attribute.

traits.name: Cartridge Charge
traits.effect:
Stores a Cartridge in your Powder Gauge after successfully completing a combo with Solid Barrel.
Maximum Cartridges: 2

traits.name: Enhanced Brutal Shell
traits.effect:
Grants the effect of Brutal Shell after successfully completing a combo with Brutal Shell.
Duration: 30s

traits.name: Danger Zone Mastery
traits.effect: Upgrades Danger Zone to Blasting Zone.

traits.name: Heart of Stone Mastery
traits.effect: Upgrades Heart of Stone to Heart of Corundum.

traits.name: Enhanced Aurora
traits.effect:
Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Aurora.
Maximum Charges: 2

traits.name: Melee Mastery
traits.effect: Increases the potency of Keen Edge to 200, Brutal Shell to 160, and Solid Barrel to 140.

traits.name: Enhanced Continuation
traits.effect:
Become Ready to Blast after executing Burst Strike.
Duration: 10s

traits.name: Cartridge Charge II
traits.effect:
Increases Powder Gauge capacity to 3 Cartridges.
Executing Bloodfest stores 3 Cartridges.
